lines.text: create integer array a with size 2
create integers n , i with i = 0
read a [ 0 ] read a [ 1 ] read n
while decrement n by result of run __gcd with ( a [ i ] , n ) as arguments is true , set i to i ^ 1
lines.code: while ( n -= __gcd ( a [ i ] , n ) ) { i ^= 1 ; }
